title: The Gift of the GI: A World War II Christmas Story
description: It’s Christmas Eve 1944 and the Battle of the Bulge is raging across the snowy Ardennes Forest. Even in these bitter conditions, two soldiers manage to exchange gifts, but there is a bittersweet twist. Inspired by O. Henry’s classic short story, The Gift of the Magi.Important This story can be read at the author’s website
author: David Healey
